entries.journal_entry_description: The Bartender needs to learn how to make a good Spiced Tea. He will give you the items that you need. All you have to do is make it.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Use the gemstones that the Bartender gave you to make a small glass.   To use the crafting tool: Double-click on the generic crafting tool in your inventory. Double-click on the schematic that you wish to use.  Double-click on the appropriate resources. Only resources that you can use will be available. Once you decide what resources to use, press the Assemble button. Press Yes to confirm that you want to make the item. If you cancel after this point, you lose the resources. You will see how successful the item is. Press Next to continue. Press Create Object to complete the item.  Press Yes to confirm. The item will be complete in a few seconds.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Using the water and flowers that the Bartender gave you, and the small glass that you just made, make a glass of Spiced Tea.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to the Bartender with your glass of tea.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Return to the Bartender in the Cantina
